text.div:
Generated Narrative: ImplementationGuide example.fhir.ph.roadsafety

Language: en

PHRoadSafetyIG

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

https://build.fhir.org/ig/UPM-NTHC/PH-RoadSafetyIG/ImplementationGuide/example.fhir.ph.roadsafety

FHIR IG for road safety and health information in the Philippines

name: PHRoadSafetyIG
title: DRAFT PH Road Safety Implementation Guide
publisher: UP Manila - National Institutes of Health - National Telehealth Center

contact.name: UP Manila - National Institutes of Health - National Telehealth Center

description: FHIR IG for road safety and health information in the Philippines

extension.valueMarkdown: Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on HL7 Terminology
Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on the HL7 Extension Pack

resource.name: MDSRoadSafety Logical Model to FHIR Mapping
resource.description: Maps elements from the logical model to FHIR R4 resources. Generated by scripts/generate-conceptmap.js

resource.name: Road Safety AllergyIntolerance
resource.description: Known allergies, substances and reactions.

resource.name: Road Safety Bundle — EMS Submission
resource.description: Document Bundle for EMS Run Report submission. The first entry MUST be a Composition that organizes and references the other resources in the bundle (Patient, Encounter, Location, Observations, DocumentReference, Procedure, ServiceRequest, Task, Claim).

resource.name: Road Safety Bundle — ONEISS Submission
resource.description: Document Bundle for Facility ONEISS submission. The first entry MUST be a Composition that organizes and references the other resources in the bundle (Patient, Encounter, Condition, Observations, DocumentReference, Procedure, ServiceRequest).

resource.name: Road Safety Bundle — Post‑Crash Investigation
resource.description: Document Bundle for Post‑Crash investigation submission. The first entry MUST be a Composition that organizes and references post‑crash Observations and supporting DocumentReferences.

resource.name: Road Safety Claim
resource.description: Claim information related to cost of care.

resource.name: Road Safety Composition — EMS Submission
resource.description: Composition that organises an EMS run report. Sections MUST reference the other resources present in the corresponding document Bundle (Patient, Encounter, Location, Observations, DocumentReference, Procedure, ServiceRequest, Task, Claim).

resource.name: Road Safety Composition — ONEISS Submission
resource.description: Composition that organises a facility (ONEISS) submission. Sections MUST reference the other resources present in the corresponding document Bundle (Patient, Encounter, Condition, Observations, DocumentReference, Procedure, ServiceRequest).

resource.name: Road Safety Composition — Post‑Crash Investigation
resource.description: Composition that organises a Post‑Crash submission. Sections reference Observations and Documents related to post‑crash investigation (collision type, investigator presence, other risk factors, safety accessories, vehicle condition, CCTV, evidence documents).

resource.name: Road Safety Condition
resource.description: Condition resource for Road Safety IG that supports multiple coding systems, textual entries and use-case specific semantics (initial impression, final diagnosis, medical history) via code.coding slicing and category usage.

resource.name: Road Safety Condition — External Cause (category)
resource.description: Captures the ICD-10 external cause axis as a Condition.category slice. Use in addition to the specific diagnosis code.

resource.name: Road Safety Condition — Final Diagnosis
resource.description: Final diagnosis per CSV mapping.

resource.name: Road Safety Condition — Initial Impression
resource.description: Initial impression per CSV mapping.

resource.name: Road Safety Condition — Nature of Injury (category)
resource.description: Captures the ICD-10 nature-of-injury axis as a Condition.category slice. Use in addition to the specific diagnosis code.

resource.name: Road Safety Condition — Problem
resource.description: Problem (finding) per CSV mapping.

resource.name: Road Safety DocumentReference (Evidence)
resource.description: Evidence and post-crash documentation linked to the incident (e.g., cause of crash, party at fault, incident management logs, CCTV, shape files).

resource.name: Road Safety Encounter
resource.description: Encounter for EMS run report / facility submission context. Captures incident number, type, timing, participants, disposition & transfer.

resource.name: Road Safety HealthcareService
resource.description: Healthcare services offered by organizations (e.g., EMS base, receiving facility clinics/units).

resource.name: Road Safety Incident Location
resource.description: Location of incident; supports PH-Core address extensions and geolocation.

resource.name: Road Safety MedicationStatement
resource.description: Current medications as codeable concepts or references where available.

resource.name: Road Safety Minimum Dataset (MDS) Logical Model
resource.description: Abstract, sectioned logical model for the PH Road Safety MDS covering incident, patient, encounter, clinical, vitals, injuries, evidence/documents, workflow, and finance. Elements mirror the CSV rows; mappings point to target FHIR elements for subsequent profiling.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation
resource.description: Generic base Observation for road safety data; specialized concept profiles below constrain code/value patterns.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Abrasion
resource.description: Abrasion present; with optional site and details.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Activity at Time of Incident
resource.description: Activity of the patient at time of incident; allow text fallback.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Avulsion
resource.description: Avulsion present; with optional site and details.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Blood Alcohol Concentration
resource.description: Blood alcohol concentration.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Blood Pressure
resource.description: Blood pressure using component entries for systolic/diastolic.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Body Temperature
resource.description: Body temperature.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Breath Sounds
resource.description: Breath sounds assessment.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Call Source
resource.description: Call source description (free text).

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - CCTV Available
resource.description: Availability of CCTV video.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Clinical Remarks
resource.description: Clinical remarks/notes.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Collision Type
resource.description: Collision type (Angle, Head-on, Rear end, Side swipe, etc.).

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Collision vs Non-Collision
resource.description: Indicates whether the incident was collision or non-collision.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Concussion
resource.description: Concussion present; with site and details.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Condition of Patient
resource.description: Overall condition of patient at assessment.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Contusion
resource.description: Contusion present; with site and details.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Cyanosis
resource.description: Cyanosis assessment.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Date of Consultation
resource.description: Date of consultation at facility.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Date of Injury
resource.description: Date of injury occurrence.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Date/Time of Injury
resource.description: Timestamp of injury occurrence.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Date/Time Received by EMS
resource.description: Calendar/timestamp the EMS/dispatch received the request.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Extent of Injury
resource.description: Extent / severity estimate or category of injury (e.g., minor, moderate, severe).

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - External Cause: Bites/Stings
resource.description: Flag indicating bites/stings.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - External Cause: Burns
resource.description: Flag indicating burns as external cause.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - External Cause: Burns
resource.description: Flag indicating burns as external cause.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - External Cause: Chemical/Substance
resource.description: Observation for chemical/substance exposure.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - External Cause: Contact with Sharp Object
resource.description: Flag indicating sharp object cause.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - External Cause: Drowning
resource.description: Flag indicating drowning.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - External Cause: Exposure to Forces of Nature
resource.description: Flag indicating exposure to natural disaster/calamity.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - External Cause: Fall
resource.description: Flag indicating fall.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - External Cause: Firecracker
resource.description: Flag indicating firecracker-related cause.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - External Cause: Gunshot
resource.description: Flag indicating gunshot.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - External Cause: Hanging/Strangulation
resource.description: Flag indicating hanging/strangulation.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - External Cause: Mauling/Assault
resource.description: Flag indicating assault.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - External Cause: Other
resource.description: Flag indicating other external cause.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - External Cause: Sexual Assault/Abuse/Rape (Alleged)
resource.description: Flag indicating sexual assault.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Fracture
resource.description: Fracture observation. Use valueCodeableConcept to indicate fracture type (e.g., open or closed). Sites captured in top-level bodySite and details in note.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Glasgow Coma Scale
resource.description: GCS with components for eyes, verbal, motor; optional total score as integer.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - How Many Patients Involved
resource.description: Count of patients involved.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - How Many Vehicles Involved
resource.description: Count of vehicles involved.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - If Alive: Conscious/Unconscious
resource.description: If alive on arrival, consciousness detail.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Injury Intent
resource.description: Intent of injury (Unintentional, Intentional-self, Intentional-violence, Undetermined).

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Level of Consciousness (AVPU)
resource.description: Level of consciousness (e.g., AVPU).

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Mode of Transport to Facility
resource.description: Mode of transport to the hospital/facility; allow coded value with optional text for 'Others'.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Multiple Injuries?
resource.description: Boolean flag indicating multiple injuries.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Open Wound
resource.description: Open wound present; with site and details. Capture mechanism/type in a structured component (valueCodeableConcept with text).

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Other Risk Factors
resource.description: Other risk factors at the time of incident; allow text for 'Others'.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Other Specified Injury
resource.description: Other specified injury present; capture type as valueCodeableConcept (text allowed) with optional site and details.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Other Vehicle/Object Involved
resource.description: Other vehicle/object type involved; text for 'Others'.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Outcome at Discharge
resource.description: Outcome at discharge.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Outcome at Release
resource.description: Outcome at release from ER/OPD/RHU.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Patient's Vehicle
resource.description: Type of vehicle used by patient; text for 'Others'.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Place of Occurrence
resource.description: Place type where injury occurred; name can be carried in note when applicable.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Position of Patient
resource.description: Seat/position (driver/front passenger/rear/pedestrian); text for 'Others'.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Presence of Traffic Investigator
resource.description: Boolean presence/absence of traffic investigator.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Priority Level (Urgency)
resource.description: System-generated urgency level per CAD/agency rules.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Pulse Quality
resource.description: Pulse quality.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Pulse Rate
resource.description: Pulse/heart rate in beats/min.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Pulse Rhythm
resource.description: Pulse rhythm.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Pupils
resource.description: Pupil size/reactivity summary.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Referred By Facility
resource.description: Flag indicating patient was referred by another hospital/facility.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Reported Complaint
resource.description: Free-text reported complaint.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Respiratory Rate
resource.description: Respiratory rate in breaths/min.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Respiratory Rhythm
resource.description: Respiratory rhythm (normal/irregular/labored).

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Run Report Comments
resource.description: General comments from run report.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Safety Accessories
resource.description: Safety accessories present/used; allow text for 'Others'.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Status on Arrival
resource.description: Status upon reaching facility/hospital.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Time Departed Scene
resource.description: Timestamp unit departed scene.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Time Enroute
resource.description: Timestamp when unit dispatched/began traveling.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Time of Consultation
resource.description: Time of consultation at facility.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Time of Emergency Station Arrival
resource.description: Timestamp unit returned to base/became available.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Time of Hospital Arrival
resource.description: Timestamp unit arrived at receiving facility.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Time of Injury
resource.description: Time of injury occurrence.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Time On Scene
resource.description: Timestamp crew arrived at scene.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Time Received
resource.description: Time the call/request was received by EMS/dispatch.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Transferred From Facility
resource.description: Flag indicating patient transferred from another hospital/facility.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Transport/Vehicular Accident
resource.description: Boolean flag indicating transport/vehicular accident.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Traumatic Amputation
resource.description: Traumatic amputation present; with site and details.

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Triage Priority
resource.description: Triage category assigned at scene (e.g., Red/Yellow/Green/Black).

resource.name: Road Safety Observation - Vehicle Used
resource.description: Vehicle used during response.

resource.name: Road Safety Organization
resource.description: Organization profile for EMS providers and receiving facilities involved in road safety encounters.

resource.name: Road Safety Patient
resource.description: Patient demographics and identifiers for road safety reporting; reuse PH-Core address extensions for barangay/city/province/region.

resource.name: Road Safety Procedure
resource.description: Procedures related to incident/report (e.g., coordination with receiving hospital, psychosocial support, interventions).

resource.name: Road Safety Procedure - Transport Coordination
resource.description: Procedure record indicating whether transport coordination with the receiving hospital was done.

resource.name: Road Safety Service Location
resource.description: Facility/service delivery location. Type bound to HL7 v3 ServiceDeliveryLocationRoleType (e.g., ER, ward, clinic).

resource.name: Road Safety ServiceRequest
resource.description: Requests or records related to refusal to admit and related workflow signals.

resource.name: Road Safety Task
resource.description: Workflow tracking for report receipt, durations of delay, and sources of delays.

resource.name: RS VS - Activity at Time of Incident
resource.description: Activity at time of incident (prefer SNOMED CT).

resource.name: RS VS - Alive Detail (Consciousness)
resource.description: If alive on arrival: conscious vs unconscious.

resource.name: RS VS - Bites/Stings Agent
resource.description: Type of animal/insect/plant causing bite or sting; use LOINC code where provided in mappings.

resource.name: RS VS - Breath Sounds
resource.description: Breath sounds options (prefer SNOMED CT).

resource.name: RS VS - Burn Degrees
resource.description: Burn degree/severity (1st, 2nd, 3rd, 4th) as mapped from ONEISS/CSV (SNOMED CT).

resource.name: RS VS - Burns Agent
resource.description: Agent causing burn (prefer SNOMED CT).

resource.name: RS VS - Collision Category
resource.description: Collision vs non-collision category.

resource.name: RS VS - Cyanosis
resource.description: Cyanosis assessment options (prefer SNOMED CT).

resource.name: RS VS - Disposition (ER/OPD/BHS/RHU)
resource.description: Patient disposition at ER/OPD/BHS/RHU.

resource.name: RS VS - Disposition (In-Patient)
resource.description: Patient disposition for in-patient cases.

resource.name: RS VS - Drowning Type/Body of Water
resource.description: Type/body of water for drowning incidents.

resource.name: RS VS - GCS Eyes
resource.description: Glasgow Coma Scale eye opening responses (LOINC LA codes).

resource.name: RS VS - GCS Motor
resource.description: Glasgow Coma Scale motor responses (LOINC LA codes).

resource.name: RS VS - GCS Verbal
resource.description: Glasgow Coma Scale verbal responses (LOINC LA codes).

resource.name: RS VS - Injury Intent
resource.description: Injury intent options mapped from ONEISS (prefer SNOMED CT).

resource.name: RS VS - Level of Consciousness (AVPU)
resource.description: AVPU options for level of consciousness (prefer SNOMED CT).

resource.name: RS VS - Mode of Transport to Facility
resource.description: Mode of transport to the hospital/facility.

resource.name: RS VS - Other Risk Factors
resource.description: Other risk factors at time of incident (prefer SNOMED CT).

resource.name: RS VS - Other Vehicle in Collision
resource.description: Other vehicle/object involved in collision.

resource.name: RS VS - Outcome
resource.description: Outcome: Improved, Unimproved, Died.

resource.name: RS VS - Patient's Vehicle
resource.description: Vehicle used by patient (prefer SNOMED CT; local additions where specified).

resource.name: RS VS - Place of Occurrence
resource.description: Place of occurrence (prefer SNOMED CT; local additions where specified).

resource.name: RS VS - Position of Patient
resource.description: Position/role of patient in transport incidents (prefer SNOMED CT).

resource.name: RS VS - PSGC Barangay
resource.description: PSGC Barangay codes (managed externally).

resource.name: RS VS - PSGC City/Municipality
resource.description: PSGC City/Municipality codes (managed externally).

resource.name: RS VS - PSGC Province
resource.description: PSGC Province codes (managed externally).

resource.name: RS VS - PSGC Region
resource.description: PSGC Region codes (managed externally).

resource.name: RS VS - Pulse Quality
resource.description: Pulse quality options (prefer SNOMED CT).

resource.name: RS VS - Pulse Rhythm
resource.description: Pulse rhythm options (prefer SNOMED CT).

resource.name: RS VS - Pupils
resource.description: Pupil size/reactivity options (prefer SNOMED CT).

resource.name: RS VS - Respiratory Rhythm
resource.description: Respiratory rhythm options (prefer SNOMED CT).

resource.name: RS VS - Safety Devices
resource.description: Safety devices present/used (prefer SNOMED CT).

resource.name: RS VS - Status on Arrival
resource.description: Status upon reaching facility/hospital.

resource.name: RS VS - Transport Accident: Land/Water/Air
resource.description: Exposure context for transport accident: land, water, air (ICD-11).

resource.name: RS VS - Type of Patient
resource.description: Type of patient (ER/OPD/RHU/BHS context).
